definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: Many of the gold ornaments are melted down to be made into coins.
sentences.chinese: 很多黄金饰物回炉后铸成了金币。

sentences.english: I really encourage you to take time to make these garnishes.
sentences.chinese: 我真的推荐你抽时间制作这些装饰物。
那是有叶形饰物之拱门。

sentences.english: I can even visualize their facial expressions and ornaments on their robes.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至记得，他们脸上的表情，以及藏袍下的饰物。

sentences.english: Many adornments were carved on the temple walls.
sentences.chinese: 寺院的墙壁上刻著很多装饰物。

sentences.english: Imitations can be made in France as well as in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 在法国我们可以象德国那样仿造这些饰物。

sentences.english: An elegant watch, for instance, is a great accessory.
sentences.chinese: 比如一块很上档次的表就是件不错的饰物。

sentences.english: I guess I’d better get out the Christmas ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 我想我最好把圣诞节装饰物挂出去。

sentences.english: I am not huge on decorations that I have to dust or clean all the time.
sentences.chinese: 我不挂饰物，这样就不用整天为它们拂尘做清洁。

sentences.english: She wore a green pendant suspended from a silver chain.
sentences.chinese: 她戴了一个绿色饰物，是悬挂在银链上的。

sentences.english: Not to permit any addition of decoration of an inflammable nature.
sentences.chinese: 不准许加设易燃的装饰物。

sentences.english: Well-dressed women accessorize according to the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 衣着入时的女士根据不同场合选戴不同饰物。

sentences.english: A set of jade pendants on a girdle is one unique kind of Chinese personal ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 组玉佩是中国人独有的一种随身佩带的玉饰物。

sentences.english: What garnishes come with the salmon steak?
sentences.chinese: 鲑鱼排上加些什么装饰物呢？

sentences.english: What type(s) of clothing or accessories do you purchase most? You may choose more than one choice.
sentences.chinese: 最常购买那种类型的衣服或饰物？可选多于一项。
买得到饰物，但买不到美丽。

definition: to wear (as accessories)/carry at the waist
